name: vim-ai (madox2)
description: [项目级] AI-powered code assistant for Vim. OpenAI and ChatGPT plugin for Vim and Neovim.。来源: https://github.com/madox2/vim-ai

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
AI-powered code assistant for Vim. OpenAI and ChatGPT plugin for Vim and Neovim.

来源: https://github.com/madox2/vim-ai
语言: Python
Stars: 1133

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
========== Basic AI commands ==========

:AI          complete text
:AIEdit      edit text
:AIChat      continue or open new chat
:AIStopChat  stop the generation of the AI response for the AIChat
:AIImage     generate image

============== Utilities ==============

:AIRedo          repeat last AI command
:AIUtilRolesOpen open role config file
:AIUtilDebugOn   turn on debug logging
:AIUtilDebugOff  turn off debug logging

:help vim-ai

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Generate text or code, answer questions with AI
- Edit selected text in-place with AI
- Interactive conversation with ChatGPT
- Custom roles
- Vision capabilities (image to text)
- Generate images
- Integrates with any OpenAI-compatible API
- AI provider plugins
